pkgmetadata.longdescription: NTP is a protocol designed to synchronize the clocks of computers over a network. NTP version 3 is an internet draft standard, formalized in RFC 1305. NTP version 4 is a significant revision of the NTP standard, and is the current development version, but has not been formalized in an RFC. Simple NTP (SNTP) version 4 is described in RFC 2030.

use.flag: Allow ntp to be installed alongside openntpd
Provide support for Samba's signing daemon (needed for Active Directory domain controllers)
